pullrequest.title: Change train_windows (in minibatch) to sort in reverse, such that the last index will not be greater than 9999

content.raw: If you have `valid_gmtk_window_index` above, perhaps this should be called `valid_train_window` instead. There are an awful lot of `10000` references around and especially in variables names that should be avoided if necessary. They are essentially magic numbers. Ideally if it was super verbose it would be `less_than_max_gmtk_window_count` but these names are too long.
